title: Set the Playoff Schedule
description: The regular season has ended, and a league administrator needs to set the schedule for the first round of the playoffs.

tasks.description: Retrieve the final league standings to determine the playoff matchups and seedings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the final, verified standings and the first-round matchups.

tasks.description: Consult with broadcast partners to select the best dates and time slots for the playoff games.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finalizes the game times with the broadcasters.

tasks.description: Publish the official first-round playoff schedule.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent releases the schedule to the public and the teams.
